It's quite cold up here, with a frigid mountain wind whistling through the branches of the large trees.  Other than the noise of the wind, however, the forest is utterly quiet.

East.description: The forest thickens and deepens to the east.

rooms.name: A Deep Forest
rooms.description: These dense, evergreen trees form the cliffside ledge of a narrow band of level ground around a huge mountain that rises to the north.  It's quite cold up here, with a frigid mountain wind whistling through the branches of the large trees.  Other than the noise of the wind, however, the forest is utterly quiet.

North.description: The forest seems to end to the north.

East.description: The forest seems to end to the east.

South.description: The forest continues.

West.description: The forest continues to the west.

rooms.name: A Deep Forest's End
rooms.description: These dense, evergreen trees form the cliffside ledge of a narrow band of level ground around a huge mountain that rises to the north.  It's quite cold up here, with a frigid mountain wind whistling through the branches of the large trees.  Other than the noise of the wind, however, the forest is utterly quiet.  The trees thin out as the cliff of the mountain rises to the north, far too steeply to climb or even to support tree life.

East.description: The forest's edge continues.

South.description: The forest continues to the south.

rooms.name: A Deep Forest's End
rooms.description: These dense, evergreen trees form the cliffside ledge of a narrow band of level ground around a huge mountain that rises to the north.  It's quite cold up here, with a frigid mountain wind whistling through the branches of the large trees.  Other than the noise of the wind, however, the forest is utterly quiet.  The trees thin out as the cliff of the mountain rises to the north, far too steeply to climb or even to support tree life.

East.description: The forest's edge continues, ending to the east.

South.description: The forest's edge continues to the south.

West.description: The forest's edge continues, ending to the west.

rooms.name: A Deep Forest's End
rooms.description: These dense, evergreen trees form the cliffside ledge of a narrow band of level ground around a huge mountain that rises to the north.  It's quite cold up here, with a frigid mountain wind whistling through the branches of the large trees.  Other than the noise of the wind, however, the forest is utterly quiet.  The trees thin out as the cliff of the mountain rises to the north, far too steeply to climb or even to support tree life.

West.description: The forest's edge continues.

rooms.name: A Very Steep Climb
rooms.description: This cliff is part of a mountain that rises to the west and south.  It's just barely climbable.  Trees cluster around in a half-circle to the north, while a footpath begins to the south.

North.description: The forest seems to end to the north.

South.description: A footpath begins to the south.

Up.description: You can climb a steep slope above, though you can't tell what lies up there.

rooms.name: A Quiet Wood
rooms.description: Trees cover the sloping top of a very tall mountain that towers over the rest of the peaks in the Syric Mountain Range.  The trees are dark evergreens. They're a little on the thin side -- not very fully limbed.  The mist on the mountain wafts around the trees, shrouding them and half-obscuring them.

West.description: The forest continues.

Down.description: A steep cliff heads down, into a forest.

rooms.name: A Quiet Wood
rooms.description: Trees cover the sloping top of a very tall mountain that towers over the rest of the peaks in the Syric Mountain Range.  The trees are dark evergreens. They're a little on the thin side -- not very fully limbed.  The mist on the mountain wafts around the trees, shrouding them and half-obscuring them.

North.description: The forest continues a short distance.

East.description: The forest continues a short distance, ending at a cliff.

South.description: The forest continues a short distance.

rooms.name: A Quiet Wood
rooms.description: Trees cover the sloping top of a very tall mountain that towers over the rest of the peaks in the Syric Mountain Range.  The trees are dark evergreens. They're a little on the thin side -- not very fully limbed.  The mist on the mountain wafts around the trees, shrouding them and half-obscuring them.  The slope of the mountain heads downward to the south, but it is so steep that passage is impossible.

North.description: The woods continue a short distance.

West.description: The woods continue for quite a ways. It seems like someone has blazed a trail through the dark trees.

rooms.name: A Quiet Wood
rooms.description: Trees cover the sloping top of a very tall mountain that towers over the rest of the peaks in the Syric Mountain Range.  The trees are dark evergreens. They're a little on the thin side -- not very fully limbed.  The mist on the mountain wafts around the trees, shrouding them and half-obscuring them.

North.description: The woods continue a short distance before they become impassible.

East.description: The woods continue, ending at a ledge.

South.description: The woods continue, ending at a ledge.

rooms.name: A Quiet Wood
rooms.description: Trees cover the sloping top of a very tall mountain that towers over the rest of the peaks in the Syric Mountain Range.  The trees are dark evergreens. They're a little on the thin side -- not very fully limbed.  The mist on the mountain wafts around the trees, shrouding them and half-obscuring them.

South.description: The woods continue for a distance.

West.description: The woods continue, ending at the brightly-painted side of a wagon.

rooms.name: A Quiet Wood
rooms.description: Trees cover the sloping top of a very tall mountain that towers over the rest of the peaks in the Syric Mountain Range.  The trees are dark evergreens. They're a little on the thin side -- not very fully limbed.  The mist on the mountain wafts around the trees, shrouding them and half-obscuring them.  The slope of the mountain heads downward to the south, but it's so steep that passage is impossible.

North.description: The woods continue for a distance.

West.description: The forest continues.

rooms.name: A Quiet Wood
rooms.description: Trees cover the sloping top of a very tall mountain that towers over the rest of the peaks in the Syric Mountain Range.  The trees are dark evergreens. They're a little on the thin side -- not very fully limbed.  The mist on the mountain wafts around the trees, shrouding them and half-obscuring them.  The slope of the mountain heads downward to the south, but it's so steep that passage is impossible.

South.description: The woods continue.

West.description: The forest continues. Not far away, you see brightly painted wagons.

rooms.name: A Quiet Wood
rooms.description: The scent of burning wood wafts through this dark, mist-shrouded forest. The trees, mostly stark evergreens, stand solid and implacable on the mountain's slope.  The scent is stronger to the west, curling like the mist does through the branches of the large trees.

North.description: The forest continues.

East.description: The forest continues.

West.description: You see brightly painted wagons to the west.

rooms.name: A Quiet Wood
rooms.description: The scent of burning wood wafts through this dark, mist-shrouded forest. Trees, mostly stark evergreens, stand solid and implacable on this mountain's slope.  A white mist curls up from the frigid ground, mixing with the burning scent.  Now and then a voice raised in laughter or conversation can be heard. Passage to the north and west is blocked by some painted wagons of the type used by Gypsies for the past few centuries.

East.description: The forest continues.

South.description: The woods continue.

rooms.name: A Quiet Wood
rooms.description: The scent of burning wood wafts through this dark, mist-shrouded forest. Trees, mostly stark evergreens, stand solid and implacable on this mountain's slope.  A white mist curls up from the frigid ground, mixing with the burning scent.  Now and then a voice raised in laughter or conversation can be heard, far away.

North.description: The woods continue.

rooms.name: A Quiet Wood
rooms.description: Trees cover the sloping top of a very tall mountain that towers over the rest of the peaks in the Syric Mountain Range.  The trees are dark evergreens. They're a little on the thin side -- not very fully limbed.  The mist on the mountain wafts around the trees, shrouding them and half-obscuring them.  The slope of the mountain heads downward to the south, but it's so steep that passage is impossible.

East.description: The woods continue.

West.description: The woods continue for quite a distance, you think.

rooms.name: A Quiet Wood
rooms.description: Trees cover the sloping top of a very tall mountain that towers over the rest of the peaks in the Syric Mountain Range.  The trees are dark evergreens. They're a little on the thin side -- not very fully limbed.  The mist on the mountain wafts around the trees, shrouding them and half-obscuring them. Other than the sound of the cold mountain wind whistling thruogh the branches of the trees, there are no other sounds to be heard.

North.description: The woods continue, ending at a brightly-painted wagon.

East.description: The woods continue for a short distance.

South.description: The woods continue to the south, ending at a ledge.

West.description: The woods continue a short distance before becoming impassible.

rooms.name: A Quiet Wood
rooms.description: Trees cover the sloping top of a very tall mountain that towers over the rest of the peaks in the Syric Mountain Range.  The trees are dark evergreens. They're a little on the thin side -- not very fully limbed.  The mist on the mountain wafts around the trees, shrouding them and half-obscuring them.  The slope of the mountain heads downward to the south, but it's so steep that passage is impossible.

North.description: The woods continue as far as you can see through the mists. You see a flash of red and yellow somewhere ahead.

rooms.name: A Quiet Wood Beside a Stream
rooms.description: Nearly black tree trunks rise into the obscured skies, while white, swirling mists shroud everything in sight.  Other than the faint sound of the wind in the tree branches, it is utterly quiet.  A dark grey stream runs to the north, though you can't get to it past the stones at its banks.  Beyond it, to the north, you see a large encampment of painted wagons.

East.description: The woods continue.

South.description: The woods continue.

rooms.name: A Quiet Wood
rooms.description: This quiet corner of the woods is wedged up against the edge of a stream. You can hear it bubbling beneath your feet, in fact, under the cold ground. Through the dark evergreen trees, to the north, you can see a large encampment of brightly painted wagons, though there is no way to get to it from here.

South.description: The woods continue.

rooms.name: A Quiet Wood
rooms.description: Trees cover the sloping top of a very tall mountain that towers over the rest of the peaks in the Syric Mountain Range.  The trees are dark evergreens. They're a little on the thin side -- not very fully limbed.  The mist on the mountain wafts around the trees, shrouding them and half-obscuring them.  The slope of the mountain heads downward to the south, but it's so steep that passage is impossible.

North.description: The woods continue.

West.description: The forest seems to go on, disappearing into the mists.

rooms.name: A Quiet Wood Approaching a Castle
rooms.description: Trees cover the sloping top of a very tall mountain that towers over the rest of the peaks in the Syric Mountain Range.  The trees are dark evergreens. They're a little on the thin side -- not very fully limbed.  The mist on the mountain wafts around the trees, shrouding them and half-obscuring them.  The slope of the mountain heads downward to the south, but it's so steep that passage is impossible.  To the west, rising into the mists, you see a rough, crude castle of some kind.

North.description: The woods continue.

East.description: The woods continue.

West.description: The woods continue. Beyond the trees, you see a castle.

rooms.name: A Quiet Wood Beside a Stream
rooms.description: Nearly black tree trunks rise into the obscured skies, while white, swirling mists shroud everything in sight.  Other than the faint sound of the wind in the tree branches, it is utterly quiet.  A dark grey stream runs to the north, though you can't get to it past the stones at its banks.  Beyond it, to the north, you see a large encampment of painted wagons.  To the west, you see the rail of a long bridge that extends across one of the stream's branches, but you can't get to it from here.

South.description: The woods continue a short distance.

rooms.name: Approaching a Bridge Across a Ravine
rooms.description: Nearly black tree trunks rise into the obscured skies, while white, swirling mists shroud everything in sight.  Other than the faint sound of the wind in the tree branches, it is utterly quiet.  A dark grey stream runs to the north, though you can't get to it past the stones at its banks.  Beyond it, to the north, you see a large encampment of painted wagons.  To the west rises a castle, dark, mildewed, and pitted with age, with dark green vines creeping across its tall, merciless face.  To the north you see the beginning of a crudely made bridge.

North.description: To the north, you see a vast bridge's beginning.

East.description: The woods continue.

rooms.name: The Beginning of the Goblin Bridge
rooms.description: A wooden suspension bridge spans a stream that runs to the north.  The wine-dark river that disappears into the mist.  In the other direction, the river runs into the ground just south of the bridge.  Some slats of the bridge are falling off or are missing entirely; the rope rails are half eaten away by age; and, most alarming, it sways to and fro gently in the breeze.

South.description: You can leave the bridge and enter a quiet forest to the south.

West.description: The bridge continues, crossing a stream underneath.

rooms.name: The Goblin Bridge
rooms.description: A wooden suspension bridge spans a stream that runs to the north.  The wine-dark river that disappears into the mist.  In the other direction, the river runs into the ground just south of the bridge.  Some slats of the bridge are falling off or are missing entirely; the rope rails are half eaten away by age; and, most alarming, it sways to and fro gently in the breeze.

East.description: The bridge ends to the east.

West.description: The bridge ends to the west, before a badly-made castle.

rooms.name: The Goblin Bridge
rooms.description: A wooden suspension bridge spans a stream that runs to the north.  The wine-dark river that disappears into the mist.  In the other direction, the river runs into the ground just south of the bridge.  Some slats of the bridge are falling off or are missing entirely; the rope rails are half eaten away by age; and, most alarming, it sways to and fro gently in the breeze.  The bridge ends here, running to the east.  To the south stands the raised drawbridge of the quiet, dark castle.

East.description: The bridge runs for a distance to the east.

South.description: You see the drawbridge to the dark castle is raised.

extras.text: In point of fact, it'd be more accurate to say that the drawbridge has no choice in the matter of whether or not it's raised. The mechanism that raises it, a short, stout wheel-like device, is clearly visible from here; it's just as clearly rusted clean through.

rooms.name: The Enchanted Wood
rooms.description: This forest is dark, quiet, and enshrouded in mist, like the rest of the mountaintop's woods..  But something is different..  It seems like every time you turn around, you see something flicker in the corner of your eye.  You shiver in the cold as you walk.  The woods go on to the west, while, to the south, an open culvert leads to unknown destinations.

South.description: You see a culvert to the south.

West.description: The forest continues.

rooms.name: An Escape Tunnel
rooms.description: This little passageway has slimy walls and a muck-covered floor, and its ceiling is far too low. It seems fairly round in shape, with curving walls. The tunnel runs toward the north.

North.description: The tunnel ends at an enchanted wood.

East.description: You see a panel.

extras.text: It is quite difficult to read the words on the panel, but you try to do it anyway.

The words read: This panel is enchanted! To open it, you must open a secret door. The name of the secret door is the name of the man who was Cardinal of Templace after the Kaaz were destroyed. Beware, though, of foolhardiness; beyond this panel lie many dangers.

rooms.name: The Home of the Goblin King
rooms.description: This castle is smaller than most, almost a stone fort, really.  It's also quite old, you sense.  The stones that compose it are almost all half-rotted by time.  Mildew and vines are taking over, as well.  And the smell is just awful -- a reek of rotting food and ancient dust. The stones splinter into fragments loudly when they are touched or stepped upon, and the whole place creaks alarmingly every so often.

North.description: You see a bridge to the north, past an open drawbridge.

East.description: The castle seems to continue.

South.description: Dark halls seem to glow to the south.

West.description: You see something unusual.

extras.text: The question reads: The name of the door is the name of the Gypsy Prince's bride. --Sirestis
The patch, upon closer examination, frames a question that is inked right onto the stones.
There's a peculiar patch of mildew on the wall, in almost a perfect circle. Now, isn't that odd?
No, on second examination, you realize there isn't a panel there after all. Keep looking.
The wall... there's just something strange about it. Oh! There's a panel there... you think.

rooms.name: The Home of the Goblin King
rooms.description: This castle is smaller than most, almost a stone fort.  The stones that compose it are almost all half-rotted by time.  Mildew and vines are taking over, as well.  And the smell is just incredible!  The stone tiles of the floor splinter into chunks at a touch, with a loud cracking noise.  Light struggles in through the tall, narrow windows, barely illuminating the chambers inside the castle.

South.description: You see an aerie of some kind to the south.

West.description: The castle continues.

rooms.name: The Enchanted Wood
rooms.description: This evergreen forest is composed of numerous thick-trunked, ancient trees whose branches filter out almost all the light from above.  There are no sounds of animals or birds here; it is utterly quiet.  A swirling white mist rises up from the cold ground.

North.description: The woods continue.

East.description: The woods continue.

rooms.name: The Enchanted Wood
rooms.description: Ancient trees sprout right out of this mountain's gentle south slope. Swirling mists cover the entire mountainside.  The cold ground seems very alive underfoot, as if something magical is happening underneath your feet..  The forest is almost noiseless; there is no sound of insects, or of birds. Despite this, occasionally a flash of movement can just barely be seen.  To the north stands a house mounted on a pair of gigantic chicken legs!

East.description: The woods continue.

South.description: The woods continue.

West.description: The woods continue for a short distance.

rooms.name: The Goblin Flier Aerie
rooms.description: You carefully pick your way through rocks and general filth and decay. Really disgusting bits.  Small shelves and bins made of wood almost disintegrate at a glance.  There is a wealth of wood, canvas and silk, and pots of dried, dark green paint lying around.  The aerie opens out into a cliff that affords a magnificent view of the mountains all around.

North.description: The castle continues.

rooms.name: The Throne Room of the Goblin King
rooms.description: It's not much, but they like to call it home.  This room is large, with a high ceiling, as is proper for a throne room.  A rotted, dark green carpet that was once worked in cunning gold designs leads up to a few decaying steps.  On a dais stands a throne made of darkly patina'd copper.  The throne is obviously not a human creation, but the strange whorls and engravings and carvings have their own appeal.  It's not like a standard throne, but if you were a goblin, you'd probably just love it.  To the south, huge, mostly intact windows look out over the mountains.

North.description: The castle continues.

rooms.name: Baba Yaga's Home
rooms.description: Something smells disgusting in here!  The witch's home is a one-room shack held up by chicken legs that she can tell to move anywhere she likes.  Today the witch favors a specifically eastern view of the top of the mountain, so the sole window faces east.  Inside, the single room is incredibly messy. Bedclothes and garments are littered everywhere.  A hearth up against the southern wall faces a chimney.  Dangling from some hooks in the fireplace is a huge cauldron, bubbling merrily.  The only way out is back west.

West.description: An inner door blocks passage to the west.

extras.text: The pot's made of thick black iron. It's either too heavy to lift, or it's bolted right into the floor. Inside the pot a very foul-smelling soup bubbles.

rooms.name: The Enchanted Wood
rooms.description: This part of the forest comprises trees so large and so thickly branched with pine-smelling evergreen that the light barely even brushes the ground.  A thick, swirling mist rises up from the cold ground, obscuring vision slightly. To the northeast, you see a house on some kind of stilts.

East.description: The woods continue.

West.description: The woods continue.

rooms.name: The Enchanted Wood
rooms.description: Silent old trees grace this forest with thick, bushy evergreen branches that filter the dim light from the sun and moon, casting weird shadows and occasionally even allowing a shaft of light to touch the dark, grassy ground. A persistent swirling mist rises up from the cold forest floor, further filtering the light.  Though there is no path, it is obviously easier to move in some directions than others.

North.description: The woods continue.

East.description: The woods continue.

rooms.name: The Enchanted Wood
rooms.description: Large, old trees stand against a mountainside here; the slope is very gentle, but gets steeper the further to the north one travels.  Wispy trails of smoke rise up from the cold ground, mingling with the thick evergreen branches of the trees.  To the east a ways, you see a house on some kind of stilts.

East.description: The woods continue through the mists. Not too far away, you can see a house on some kind of stilts.

South.description: The trees thin out at the edge of what seems to be a sheer cliff.

rooms.name: The Entrance to a Witch's House
rooms.description: This house looks like any ordinary house, albeit a very old and decrepit one.  Its walls are made of peeling and cracking white plaster over wood, and its roof is thatch over reeds.  The house itself rests on a pair of gigantic chicken legs!  They're really, truly chicken legs, with feathers, yellow scaled skin, long curved claws and all!  Twice as tall as a human man, they just stand there supporting the house that's up in the air.  A wooden ramp leads from the house's front door to the ground.

North.description: The woods begin, running far to the north.

East.description: A wooden ramp leads eastward and upward, to another door.

West.description: The woods extend to the west a short distance.

extras.text: As you watch the chicken legs, one of them lifts into the air and begins to idly scratch its mate with those huge, curved claws. After a moment, during which time the house wobbles alarmingly, the foot settles onto the ground again.

rooms.name: The Enchanted Wood
rooms.description: This evergreen forest is utterly quiet, and little light filters down to the ground from the thick branches of the old trees.  In daylight, it's dim, and at night, utterly black.  The ground is cold, but a mist seems to rise up from it, its tendrils curling gracefully into the air.

North.description: The woods continue.

South.description: The woods continue.

West.description: The woods continue.

rooms.name: The Enchanted Wood
rooms.description: This evergreen forest is composed of numerous thick-trunked, ancient trees whose branches filter out almost all the light from above.  There are no sounds of animals or birds here; it is utterly quiet.  A swirling white mist rises up from the cold ground.

North.description: The woods continue.

East.description: The woods continue.

rooms.name: The Enchanted Wood
rooms.description: A thick evergreen forest stands here, on a mountainside plateau.  Thick, bushy branches keep out most of the light, giving the forest a dim, shadowy appearance.  A swirling mist rises up from the frigid ground.  Though there is no path, it is easier to head in some directions than in others; the west is blocked off by foliage.

North.description: The woods continue.

East.description: The woods continue for a ways, disappearing into the mists.

South.description: The woods continue for a short distance.

rooms.name: The Enchanted Wood
rooms.description: This is the far edge of a large evergreen forest.  The mountain slopes far too steeply to allow such huge old trees to flourish there.  All is quiet here, with no noise at all from animals or birds, though a white, swirling mist rises up from the frigid ground.

South.description: The wood continues.

West.description: The wood continues.

rooms.name: A Quiet Wood
rooms.description: Stark, dark-colored trees make up this evergreen forest.  A faint scent of fire seems to mingle with the white mist that swirls all around the thick-trunked old trees.  It is utterly silent, with no sounds of animals or birds.

South.description: The quiet wood continues to the south.

rooms.name: The Entrance to a Gypsy Caravan
rooms.description: How'd you find this place?  It rises out of the mists like a legend out of the dawn of history.  Somehow, this encampment of brightly- painted wooden wagons seems at once instantly new and as old as time itself.  Wagons with wooden steps leading down from their doors form a half-circle around a bonfire a ways to the west.  A few of the wagons seem more ornate than others, but other than that, they are uniform in appearance.

East.description: A deep, forbidding wood stands to the east, going on for a ways.

West.description: You see more wagons. Beyond that, a bonfire crackles.

rooms.name: A Gypsy Caravan
rooms.description: Somehow, this encampment of brightly-painted wooden wagons seems at once instantly new and as old as time itself.  Wagons with wooden steps leading down from their doors form a half-circle around a bonfire a ways to the west.  A few of the wagons seem more ornate than others, but other than that, they are uniform in appearance.

North.description: You see some more wagons to the north, up against a cliff face.

East.description: You see the entrance to the caravan to the east. Beyond that, you see the forest.

South.description: You see more wagons to the south.

West.description: You see a bonfire to the west. Beyond that, you see water.

rooms.name: A Gypsy Caravan
rooms.description: Somehow, this encampment of brightly-painted wooden wagons seems at once instantly new and as old as time itself.  Wagons with wooden steps leading down from their doors form a half-circle around a bonfire a ways to the west.  A few of the wagons seem more ornate than others, but other than that, they are uniform in appearance.

North.description: You see wagons arranged in a tight row that heads far to the north.

West.description: You see a very ornate wagon, fancier than the rest, to the west.

rooms.name: A Gypsy Caravan
rooms.description: Somehow, this encampment of brightly-painted wooden wagons seems at once instantly new and as old as time itself.  Wagons with wooden steps leading down from their doors form a half-circle around a bonfire a ways to the west.  A few of the wagons seem more ornate than others, but other than that, they are uniform in appearance.

South.description: You see some more wagons to the south, arranged in a tight circle.

rooms.name: The Fortune Teller's Wagon
rooms.description: Inside the dark wagon, the air smells of cooked meat and slightly rancid oil, and old perfume.  Pictures line every available vertical surface of this wagon.  Some of the paintings are ancient, some more recent; some are of people, some of faraway lands.  One seems to be familiar.  Silk scarves with outrageous fringe cover a trunk, a bed, a bureau, and a circular table on which sits a crystal ball.

South.description: You see a bonfire to the south.

extras.text: The painting, it seems, is of the Altar to Mielikki. How did it end up here?

As you look into the ball, you feel yourself growing drowsy.. You sleep, and dream.. You are young again, and powerful, and so beautiful it makes men's hearts ache to look at you. And tonight you are also afraid. The sight of the Undead Priests in the old witch's crystal ball has made you fear, not for yourself, but for those you love. Not for your brother, though... If the Black Knights are here, then he must be beyond anyone's care but Mielikki's... For your brother you feel only an ache and a lust for revenge. So you've fled the safety of your home, to lure the evil Knights to you, and keep them from the Gypsies who have adopted you so kindly. Now, standing in a field in the darkest part of the cold forest, you wait for them. Your sword fairly rings with its hatred of the evil that is coming. You make your stand in the night, knowing that you must destroy every single one of the undead enemies, or they will quickly find the new life you have forged.. and they will kill your husband, and the son you have borne. The strange hallucination fades, and you come out of your sleep feeling vaguely worried and wild-eyed.

rooms.name: A Bonfire
rooms.description: This crackling bonfire, circled by stones and surrounded by low wooden benches, burns high with orange and yellow flames.  No one is tending the fire, but no one specifically tends it.  Sometimes a blue or a green flame springs out of the bonfire.

North.description: A wagon painted purple and hung with silken swags stands before you.

East.description: You see the caravan itself to the east.

South.description: You see an ornate wagon to the south. It's painted a delicate gold.

West.description: You see a pool of water of some kind to the west.

extras.text: The flames dance and cavort in the bonfire. Green and blue flames flicker -- and suddenly, you see them assume the form of a beautiful man and woman who dance together in the heart of the bonfire before dissipating into the fire again, to await the next chance to join.

rooms.name: A Gypsy Wagon
rooms.description: The inside of this wooden wagon smell of generations of meals cooked, of smoke, of liquors of various types -- of humanity in all its glory and dismay. The interior is trim and properly decorated with dark silken scarves, overstuffed furniture, a wooden sleigh-bed, and many pictures in rosewood frames.  It's hard to tell if the inhabitant is male or female, or if there's more than one tenant.  Outside this wagon, you can see many other wagons.  A few of the wagons seem more ornate than others, but other than that, they are uniform in appearance.

North.description: To the north, you see a bonfire. Beyond it, you see another fancy wagon.

East.description: You can exit the wagon to the east, from an informal doorway.

South.description: You can exit the wagon to the south, to a pool.

rooms.name: The Gypsy Prince's Wagon
rooms.description: A bright, pretty wagon painted in blue, gold, and white opens to reveal a similarly opulent interior.  A four-poster bed is crammed into one end of the wagon; in the other, a wooden table.  A deck of cards lies on the table. Paintings fill the room.  Some of them depict people, some places.  One depicts a beautiful woman holding an infant wrapped in white cloth.

North.description: A well stands to the north.

rooms.name: An Artesian Well
rooms.description: This perfectly pure water bubbles up from some hidden, unknown source from underground.  More clear water flows in from the west, but you can tell that the main source of the well's water is from beneath the benevolent earth.  To the south and east, you see the gypsy camp, while, to the north and west, you are surrounded by clear, cool water.  The mountaintop rises far to the west -- cold grey rock.

North.description: The well opens up into a spring to the north.

East.description: You see a bonfire crackling to the east.

South.description: You see a wagon painted in gold, royal blue, and white to the south.

West.description: A stream runs to the west. Beyond it, you see a grove of some kind.

extras.text: The woman in the painting is drop-dead beautiful in the way that a very sharp sword is beautiful. She is quite obviously a warrior, possibly the strongest of her time, but something about the way she holds her infant suggests an uncharacteristic tenderness. She looks down at the baby in her arms, smiling shyly at it as if still not believing it's hers.

rooms.name: The Headspring
rooms.description: A tall mountain stands to the north and west of here.  From a narrow crack in the grey rock of the mountain itself bubbles a spring of perfectly clear, pure water.  The gypsies who make their home here have set up some stepping stones to the very head of the spring to catch the very freshest water in mid-plunge to the pool below.  The water makes a tremendous splash and a lot of spray as it hits the pool.

South.description: A well bubbles up to the ground from the south.

West.description: The stream runs to the west before turning out of sight.

rooms.name: A Stream
rooms.description: This stream is made of perfectly pure water, as pure as is possible out in the open.  It's slowly gouging a pathway through the grey rock of the mountain; it's fairly obvious it's taken years to cut this deep of a cut, and it'll be much deeper in a few more years.  To the east, you see the source of the stream -- a headspring.  The stream runs further to the south.

East.description: A headspring rises to the east.

South.description: The stream continues to the south.

rooms.name: A Stream
rooms.description: This stream is made of perfectly pure water, as pure as is possible out in the open.  It's slowly gouging a pathway through the grey rock of the mountain; it's fairly obvious it's taken years to cut this deep of a cut, and it'll be much deeper in a few more years.  It runs from the north to south.  To the east you see it run into an artesian well, while, to the west, it runs around the edge of an island set against the side of the mountain.

North.description: The stream continues to the north, where it bends out of sight.

East.description: An artesian well rises to the east.

South.description: The stream continues.

West.description: An miniature island lies westward.

rooms.name: A Stream
rooms.description: This stream is made of perfectly pure water, as pure as is possible out in the open.  It's slowly gouging a pathway through the grey rock of the mountain; it's fairly obvious it's taken years to cut this deep of a cut, and it'll be much deeper in a few more years.  The stream runs from the north to the south. To the east, you can see some brightly-colored wagons, but can't reach it from here.

North.description: The stream continues to the north a ways.

South.description: The stream continues before branching into two further on.

rooms.name: A Stream
rooms.description: This stream is made of perfectly pure water, as pure as is possible out in the open.  It's slowly gouging a pathway through the grey rock of the mountain. The water branches off into tributaries from here that run off to the east and west, while the main branch runs here from the north.  To the south, the stream runs under a very wide bridge that extends to the west.

North.description: The stream continues quite a ways to the north.

East.description: The stream continues.

West.description: The stream continues.

rooms.name: A Stream
rooms.description: This very pure stream runs from the west to the east.  It runs through a deep cleft in the side of a very tall mountain, with an enchanted wood to the south, a gypsy camp to the north, and mist everywhere.

East.description: The stream continues to the east for a short distance.

West.description: The stream continues.

rooms.name: A Stream
rooms.description: This very pure stream runs from the west to the east. It runs through a deep cleft in the side of a very tall mountain, with an enchanted wood to the south, a gypsy camp to the north, and mist everywhere. The water burrows into the raw granite of the ground to the immediate east, where it disappears from sight.

North.description: You can leave the stream and enter a wagon to the north.

West.description: The stream continues.

rooms.name: A Stream
rooms.description: This gently curving stream is made of perfectly pure water that is so blue it rivals the sky itself. The bare rock of the mountain stands to the north and west, while to the east, the stream runs onward, disappearing into the mists of this enchanted land. To the south, you see a very large and very old wooden bridge swaying.

rooms.name: An Island Grove
rooms.description: A little bit of the mountain protrudes into the river. Time has deposited soil here, and now plants and trees make this a lush miniature ecosystem, no more than 20 or 30 paces across, but it has its appeal for you. Somewhere in the misty trees nearby, you see a flash of orange -- a bird of paradise flying past, its long tailfeathers flashing like the sun.

rooms.name: The Enchanted Wood
rooms.description: Immense, ancient evergreen trees stand just far apart enough to allow easy travel. Light barely filters down to the cold forest floor from the trees' branches, but what light does make it down illuminates the eerie white mist that curls up from the ground. The forest is utterly silent. To the east, you see the tall walls of a castle or stronghold of some kind, though you cannot get to it from here.

North.description: The forest continues.

West.description: The wood continues.

rooms.name: The Enchanted Wood
rooms.description: An ancient forest of evergreen trees stand, utterly silent, just far enough apart to allow travel through them. The little light that filters down to the ground illumines the mists rising up from the ground. To the immediate east, you can see the tall, rotting walls of a crudely made castle or keep of some kind, though you can't enter it from here. It casts a distinct shadow down onto you through the mist.

East.description: You see the edge of the woods to the east.

South.description: The wood continues.

West.description: The wood continues.

rooms.name: The Enchanted Wood
rooms.description: A forest of large, ancient evergreen trees covers this mountain plateau. Their thick pine-smelling branches keep out most of the light, though some of it does manage to reach the ground. A white mist curls up from the ground, with tendrils wrapping around the trees' lowermost branches. The only possible way out of this part of the forest is to the south.

South.description: The wood continues far to the south, disappearing into the mists.

rooms.name: A Little Secret Cave
rooms.description: There's nothing majorly fancy about this place. It's dark and dim and not intrinsically appealing. The important thing is that YOU found it! You're obviously a very, very observant person!

Up.description: The only way out of here is a trapdoor in the ceiling.

rooms.name: The Border of a Deep Forest
rooms.description: You stand at the very edge of a tall mountain that rises up to touch the sky to the north. A forest has grown up on a narrow stretch of fairly level ground. The southern face of the mountain is a steep precipice that you cannot scale safely. The forest continues to the north for a ways, though to the east, branches prevent safe passage.

North.description: The forest continues.

rooms.name: The Border of a Deep Forest
rooms.description: You stand at the very edge of a tall mountain that rises up to touch the sky to the north. These trees have grown on a narrow stretch of fairly level ground that rings the mountain's peak.

North.description: You see a primitive footpath to the north. It runs to the north a short distance.

East.description: The forest edge continues to the east, where it ends at a steep cliff.

rooms.name: A Deep Forest
rooms.description: You stand at the very edge of a tall mountain that rises up to touch the sky to the north. These trees have grown on a narrow stretch of fairly level ground that rings the mountain's peak.

West.description: The forest continues, ending at a snarl of branches not far away.

rooms.name: A Deep Forest's Edge
rooms.description: The mountain air is magnificent here, tickling your nose with half- remembered scents of flowers, evergreen trees, and flowers. The forest itself is mostly pine and fir, with the occasional maple here and there. The air seems to sparkle, and is chilly all year round. The forest falls off in a steep cliff to the south, while the mountain forming the center of the half-circle of forest rises steeply to the north far away.

North.description: The forest continues to the north.

rooms.name: A Deep Forest's Edge
rooms.description: You stand at a steep cliff that falls off toward the south. It is impassible from here. The trees grow on a fluid curve of level ground encircling the huge mountain that dominates the Syric Mountain Range. Far to the south, you see the lush fields of Farmer's Row, while to the west, you see the tiny buildings that make up the monasteries that part of the world is famous for.

North.description: The forest continues.

East.description: The forest continues.

rooms.name: A Deep Forest
rooms.description: The scent of foliage and resins crowd thickly around you as you pass through this thick, dark forest. Emerald green trees keep most of the light from passing through to the ground, but aside from the freezing wind's noise, the forest is utterly silent.

North.description: The forest extends northward.

South.description: The edge of the forest is visible to the south.

West.description: The forest's edge extends westward.

rooms.name: A Crude Footpath
rooms.description: This little path runs through the dark, enchanted forest encircling the tallest of the Syric Mountains. It continues to the east before curving out of sight. All along the dirt path, ancient evergreens stand, with their branches overhanging the way. The path extends to the north and east, and ends just to the south, at some kind of trail.

North.description: The path continues to the north.

East.description: The path continues to the east for just a short distance before curving out of sight.

South.description: The path ends at a bare mountain plateau to the south.

rooms.name: A Crude Footpath
rooms.description: This little path runs through the dark, enchanted forest encircling the tallest of the Syric Mountains. It runs to the north and west for a short distance, snaking out of sight in smooth curves. Evergreen trees crowd around the path as if they had will and volition of their own.

North.description: The path continues to the north for a short distance.

South.description: A range of trees stands southward, overlooking a steep cliff.

West.description: The path continues a short distance before curving to the west. The thick trees prevent sight or passage further than that.

rooms.name: A Deep Forest
rooms.description: Pine and fir trees stand very close to each other, allowing only the occasional spot of sunshine through to mottle the ground and greenery with light. Overall, things appear tranquil, though some might find the wind whistling through the trees a little eerie.

East.description: You see the forest's border to the east, overlooking a steep cliff.

Down.description: There is a small, barely visible sign of something about...

rooms.name: A Deep Forest's Border
rooms.description: The clean mountain air of the Syric Range is frigid and crisp here. The forest overlooks a steep cliff that prevents any kind of passage, but which looks over the entire Southern Caelian region. The mountain trail snakes out of the forest, heading southward. Beyond the lower-lying mountains, you see towers far to the south, with the forest embracing them. The huge, ancient evergreen trees that make up the forest are just far apart enough to allow travel through them to the north and west.

North.description: The forest continues.

West.description: The forest continues.

rooms.name: A Deep Forest's Border
rooms.description: The view from this circular ledge is quite spectacular, for those who can stomach heights. The forested mountainside is wild and free, with here and there a hawk flying across the high winds seeking prey. The trees themselves stand close together, branches intertwining.

East.description: The forest continues a short distance to the east.

rooms.name: A Deep Forest's Border
rooms.description: The view from this circular ledge is quite spectacular, for those who can stomach heights. The forested mountainside is wild and free, with here and there a hawk flying across the high winds seeking prey. The trees themselves stand close together, branches intertwining.

North.description: The forest continues to the north a short distance, ending at a footpath.

East.description: The forest continues.

West.description: The forest's edge continues.

rooms.name: A Deep Forest
rooms.description: Evergreen trees cluster together, their green needle-branches intertwining. The forest floor is a chaotic mess of needles, other leaves, and low-growing plants and flowers, giving this place a murky green scent.

West.description: The forest's edge continues.

rooms.name: A Firefly Grove in the Deep Forest
rooms.description: This grotto is a space in the middle of a dozen fir trees growing very close together. Water has trickled up in a bubbling fountain from the moist earth, making the air hazy and moist. No sunlight can get here through the dense trees. In the pine-scented darkness, you can see dozens, if not hundreds, of tiny, flickering fireflies in their mating dance among the trees.

North.description: You see a footpath to the north.

East.description: The forest continues.

South.description: The forest continues, ending at a steep cliff not far away.

rooms.name: A Deep Forest
rooms.description: This forest is thick with trees that cluster close together. The air is a little dark, and scented heavily with evergreens and crisp, clean mountain air. It's quite cold, you notice. The branches of the trees knot together so thickly you can only go south or west from here.

South.description: The edge of the forest is visible to the south.

West.description: A beautiful little grove lies westward.

rooms.name: A Deep Forest
rooms.description: This forest is thick with trees that cluster close together. The air is a little dark, and scented heavily with evergreens and crisp, clean mountain air. It's quite cold, you notice. The branches of the trees knot together so thickly you can only go south from here.

South.description: The forest continues to the south.

rooms.name: A Crude Footpath
rooms.description: This simple little dirt path runs to the north and south here.  Grass grows in it here and there.  The thick branches of evergreen trees overhang the way in places.

North.description: The path continues to the north.

South.description: The path continues to the south.

rooms.name: A Crude Footpath
rooms.description: This path seems fairly recent, since grass still grows here and there in it, though at least whoever made the path cleared away most of the branches and debris. Thick evergreen trees blot out any light from above, making the trail seem dark and mysterious. The path runs to the north and south.

North.description: The path continues to the north.

South.description: The path continues to the south.

rooms.name: A Deep Forest
rooms.description: This forest is thick with trees that cluster close together. The air is a little dark, and scented heavily with evergreens and crisp, clean mountain air. It's quite cold, you notice. The branches of the trees knot together so thickly you can only go north from here.

North.description: You see a path to the north.

rooms.name: A Deep Forest
rooms.description: This forest is thick with trees that cluster close together. The air is a little dark, and scented heavily with evergreens and crisp, clean mountain air. It's quite cold, you notice. The branches of the trees knot together thickly, but you can still perceive ways out in all directions but west.

North.description: You see a path to the north.

East.description: The forest continues, dark and mysterious.

South.description: The edge of the forest is visible to the south.
